physical_examinations.relevant_findings: On physical examination, normal secondary sexual characteristics, a normal phallus, but small and soft testes (2 /H110032/H110031.5 cm /H110056 cc); neurological examination noted mild dysarthria and clumsy hand movements.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Neurological abnormalities progressed with worsening dysarthria and increasingly clumsy movements.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Physical examination revealed substantial facial and chest hair, with a male-pattern pubic escutcheon; stretched penile length was 11.5 cm; testes were 10 cc each and slightly soft; speech was dysarthric; gait was highly abnormal, wide based (10 cm) with posturing of the upper extremities.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Cognitive and motor functions had continued to decline.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: Baseline LH: 0.2 IU/liter; FSH: 0.6 IU/liter; Serum T: 0.21 n m.
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Physical examination revealed high abnormal motor activities; ability to recognize 10 of 12 common odors but inconsistent responses; normal motor tone without spasticity; gait highly abnormal with unsuccessful tandem walking.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Motor and cognitive functions continued to decline.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Physical examination revealed emaciation and purposeless movements of face, trunk, and limbs; height was 185 cm, with severe dementia and no response to stimuli.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Progression to bedridden state with no purposeful movements.
